summary: Kim has grown up outside of the city in a criminal family. After a prison sentence he makes up his mind to move on. Now he wants a job, a house and a girl.
cast: Magnus Skog|Emelie Sundelin|Stefan Söderberg|Sofie Karlsson|Rolf Jarl|Tima Persson|Nicolaj Schröder|Håkan Jeppsson|Michael Petersson|Kalle Rydberg|Malin Sandberg|Åsa Söderling|Tutti von Bülow|Mikael P. Wilson
title: Odjuret
